name: Yin and Yang (robertkiszeli)
description:
Information to play the game.

You can play it alone(keyboard or gamepad) or with a frend(with keyboard and gamepad).

I recommend to play with a frend in full screen.

 Yin(black) circle is contolled by WASD or Gamepad left stick.

Yang(white) circle is controlled by the Arrow keys or Gamepad right stick.

The goal of the game is to reach the highest score before the time runs out. You get extra time by collecting yin and yang.

Avoid to collect yang with Yin or yin with Yang or to collide Yin with Yang.

And don't hit the Yin Yang symbole!

 And don't let the yin/yang touch the line.
